## Resources {#sec-resources}


- Open Science: A Practical Guide for Early-Career Researchers, [https://zenodo.org/records/7716153](https://zenodo.org/records/7716153)

- [Registration templates](https://help.osf.io/article/229-select-a-registration-template) at OSF.

- Compare registration with papers, see [https://regcheck.app](https://regcheck.app)

- [Awesome Reproducible Research](https://github.com/leipzig/awesome-reproducible-research)

- [Fairsharing](https://fairsharing.org)

### Organisations

- [Open Science Framework](https://osf.io/) 

- [FORRT](https://forrt.org/) - Framework for Open and Reproducible Research Training advancing research transparency, reproducibility, rigor, and ethics through pedagogical reform and meta-scientific research

- [rOpenSci](https://ropensci.org/) - Tools, conferences, and education

- [Reproducibility for Everyone](https://www.repro4everyone.org/) - Community-led reproducibility workshops

- [pyOpenSci](https://www.pyopensci.org/) - Promotes open and reproducible research through peer-review of scientific Python packages

- [CASCaD](https://www.cascad.tech/) - Certification Agency for Scientific Code and Data

- [Replication Network](https://replicationnetwork.com/) - Furthering the practice of replication in economics.
